Safe Network3

Security Network Space 3 (SAFE) will combine security network space 2 (DNC2) and voting chain (ELT) to introduce smart contracts, extending the security payment (instant payment, secure payment), security (asset distribution and management, based on Security net 3 voting), An Chat (secure chat), security investment (security vote, the original voting chain) and other four major application direction, to become the world's largest, most secure and most secure digital currency payment and application platform.
